com.hybris.cis.client.rest.subscription.impl

Class SubscriptionClientImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hybris.cis.client.rest.common.impl.AbstractCisClient
      • com.hybris.cis.client.rest.subscription.impl.SubscriptionClientImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CisClient, SubscriptionClient

    public class SubscriptionClientImpl
extends AbstractCisClient
implements SubscriptionClient
    Subscription client implementation.
